messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6c86d2a7ac93 ***

godoc: document -templates flag

Fixes issue 2441.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5376078

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5376078/diff/4001/src/cmd/godoc/doc.go
File src/cmd/godoc/doc.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5376078/diff/4001/src/cmd/godoc/doc.go#newcode86
src/cmd/godoc/doc.go:86: for the files in $GOROOT/lib/godoc (expert-use only)
s/-/ /
but i'd drop the parenthetical anyway. any change to the default require expertise.
